# FIML - Financial Intelligence Meta-Layer

> AI-native financial data MCP server with intelligent provider orchestration. Bloomberg's intelligence, API simplicity, AI-native design. $15/month.

FIML is the intelligent data router for AI-native finance. We give ChatGPT and Claude the same data quality as Bloomberg, at 2% of the cost, with zero integration effort. Our arbitration engine automatically picks the best data source for every query, falling back seamlessly when providers fail.

## Core Capabilities

- **MCP Protocol Server**: 10 fully operational tools for ChatGPT, Claude Desktop, and AI agents
- **17 Data Providers**: Stocks, crypto, forex, economics, news from Yahoo Finance, Alpha Vantage, CCXT, and more
- **Data Arbitration Engine**: 5-factor scoring (freshness, latency, uptime, completeness, reliability)
- **L1/L2 Cache**: Redis (10-100ms) + PostgreSQL (300-700ms) with intelligent eviction
- **Real-time Streaming**: WebSocket endpoints for live price and OHLCV data
- **Multilingual Compliance**: 9 languages (EN, ES, FR, DE, IT, PT, JA, ZH, FA)
- **Ray Multi-Agent System**: 8 specialized agents for deep analysis

## MCP Tools

### Data Query Tools
- `search-by-symbol`: Stock lookup with instant cached data and async deep analysis
- `search-by-coin`: Cryptocurrency search with multi-exchange support  
- `get-task-status`: Poll or stream async analysis task updates
- `execute-fk-dsl`: Execute Financial Knowledge DSL queries

### Session Management
- `create-analysis-session`: Create multi-query workflow sessions
- `get-session-info`: Retrieve session information
- `list-sessions`: List user sessions
- `extend-session`: Extend session expiration
- `get-session-analytics`: Session statistics and metrics

### Cache Management
- `warm-cache`: Pre-warm cache for specific symbols

## FK-DSL Query Examples

```fkdsl
# Comprehensive equity analysis
EVALUATE TSLA: PRICE, VOLATILITY(30d), CORRELATE(BTC, SPY), TECHNICAL(RSI, MACD)

# Compare cryptocurrencies  
COMPARE BTC vs ETH vs SOL ON: VOLUME(7d), LIQUIDITY, MOMENTUM(14d)

# Macro analysis
MACRO: US10Y, CPI, VIX, DXY â†’ REGRESSION ON SPY

# Market scan
SCAN NASDAQ WHERE VOLUME > AVG_VOLUME(30d) * 2 AND PRICE_CHANGE(1d) > 5%
```

## Quick Start

```bash
# Clone and install
git clone https://github.com/kiarashplusplus/FIML.git
cd FIML && ./quickstart.sh

# Or with Docker
make build && make up
curl http://localhost:8000/health
```

## API Endpoints

- REST API: `http://localhost:8000/docs` (Swagger UI)
- MCP Tools: `http://localhost:8000/mcp/tools`
- WebSocket: `ws://localhost:8000/ws/prices/{symbols}`
- Health: `http://localhost:8000/health`

## Supported Assets

| Category | Examples | Providers |
|----------|----------|-----------|
| US Equities | AAPL, TSLA, MSFT | Yahoo Finance, Alpha Vantage, Polygon |
| Crypto | BTC, ETH, SOL | CCXT (6 exchanges), CoinGecko |
| Economics | GDP, CPI, Fed Funds | FRED, Quandl |
| Forex | EUR/USD, GBP/JPY | Twelvedata, Polygon |
